title: New: Young Wonder – To You (Sacred Animals Remix)
content: Mmoths crashed at Josh’s place this week, if that doesn’t tell you how much we love the music coming from Ireland at the moment, then I don’t know what does. Sacred Animals aka Dublin’s Darragh Nolan is another bro on our hit list, (you could totally crash at mine, holla at me man). His remix of Cork based group Young Wonder and their track ‘To You’, is dramatically different, yet still retains the other worldly quality that made the original so exciting. Odd that I used the term ‘other worldly’ to describe a track that’s full to the brim with Indian samples, I’m not a xenophobe I promise. Anyway, before this article comes dangerously close to ‘life journalism’ or a therapy session, take a listen to the track.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
